017package org.apache.juneau.rest.converter;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
020
021import java.util.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026
027/**
028 * A list of {@link RestConverter} objects.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/Converters">Converters</a>
032 * </ul>
033 */
034public class RestConverterList {
035
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037   // Static
038   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
039
040   /**
041    * Static creator.
042    *
043    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
044    * @return A new builder for this object.
045    */
046   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
047      return new Builder(beanStore);
048   }
049
050   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
051   // Builder
052   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
053
054   /**
055    * Builder class.
056    */
057   @FluentSetters
058   public static class Builder extends BeanBuilder<RestConverterList> {
059
060      List<BeanCreator<RestConverter>> entries;
061
062      /**
063       * Create an empty builder.
064       *
065       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
066       */
067      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
068         super(RestConverterList.class, beanStore);
069         this.entries = list();
070      }
071
072      @Override /* BeanBuilder */
073      protected RestConverterList buildDefault() {
074         return new RestConverterList(this);
075      }
076
077      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
078      // Properties
079      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081      /**
082       * Appends the specified rest matcher classes to the list.
083       *
084       * @param values The values to add.
085       * @return This object.
086       */
087      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
088      public Builder append(Class<? extends RestConverter>...values) {
089         for (Class<? extends RestConverter> v : values)
090            entries.add(beanStore().createBean(RestConverter.class).type(v));
091         return this;
092      }
093
094      /**
095       * Appends the specified rest matcher objects to the list.
096       *
097       * @param values The values to add.
098       * @return This object.
099       */
100      public Builder append(RestConverter...values) {
101         for (RestConverter v : values)
102            entries.add(beanStore().createBean(RestConverter.class).impl(v));
103         return this;
104      }
105
106      // <FluentSetters>
107
108      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
109      public Builder impl(Object value) {
110         super.impl(value);
111         return this;
112      }
113
114      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
115      public Builder type(Class<?> value) {
116         super.type(value);
117         return this;
118      }
119
120      // </FluentSetters>
121   }
122
123   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
124   // Instance
125   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
126
127   private final RestConverter[] entries;
128
129   /**
130    * Constructor.
131    *
132    * @param builder The builder containing the contents for this list.
133    */
134   protected RestConverterList(Builder builder) {
135      entries =
136         builder
137            .entries
138            .stream()
139            .map(BeanCreator::run)
140            .toArray(RestConverter[]::new);
141   }
142
143   /**
144    * Returns the contents of this list as a {@link RestConverter} array.
145    *
146    * @return The contents of this list as a {@link RestConverter} array.
147    */
148   public RestConverter[] asArray() {
149      return entries;
150   }
151}
